fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Mark someone for death.
- Select three people. If one of them dies, mark the other two for death. (1 night cooldown)
- During the day, choose to ring and select a target. That night, anyone who visits you *or* your target will have their win condition changed to yours. You cannot use this D1. (3 uses, 2 night cooldown)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock and redirect immune
- If someone is marked for death, they will die the next night. 
- You know who is marked and cannot select them as a target for any of your abilities.
- You cannot choose to mark anyone the night you ring.
- You gain a factional chat that includes anyone you convert. Converting someone does not remove from their original factional chat. If you die at night, everyone you converted is returned to their original win condition. If you die during the day, everyone who is converted dies as well.
- You can only convert up to one-quarter of the total players, rounded down. Anyone converted beyond this number will be dealt a Basic attack instead. If you reach the faction limit with one night, it is random who gets converted and who gets attacked.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"You hear a bell toll during the night. Your time is near." (Target when marked for death)
"A deep bell echoes through the town. You don't know where it came from, but you fear what happens if you find out." (Start of Night after you ring)
"You found it. But it only took your soul." (Conversion)
"They could not escape the toll of the :neutralFaction: Hell Bell." (Public death message)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who do not succumb to your ringing.
